code: import{AllTypeActions}from'../types';export var postLogin=function postLogin(input){return{type:AllTypeActions.POST_LOGIN,input:input};};export var getCurrentAdmin=function getCurrentAdmin(){return{type:AllTypeActions.GET_CURRENT_ADMIN};};export var getAdminRoles=function getAdminRoles(offset,limit){return{type:AllTypeActions.GET_ADMIN_ROLES,limit:limit,offset:offset};};export var getAdminRole=function getAdminRole(id){return{type:AllTypeActions.GET_ADMIN_ROLE,id:id};};export var createAdminRole=function createAdminRole(input){return{type:AllTypeActions.CREATE_ADMIN_ROLE,input:input};};export var updateAdminRole=function updateAdminRole(id,input){return{type:AllTypeActions.UPDATE_ADMIN_ROLE,input:input,id:id};};export var getAdminAccounts=function getAdminAccounts(offset,limit){return{type:AllTypeActions.GET_ADMIN_ACCOUNTS,limit:limit,offset:offset};};export var getAdminAccount=function getAdminAccount(id){return{type:AllTypeActions.GET_ADMIN_ACCOUNT,id:id};};export var createAdminAccount=function createAdminAccount(input){return{type:AllTypeActions.CREATE_ADMIN_ACCOUNT,input:input};};export var updateAdminAccount=function updateAdminAccount(id,input){return{type:AllTypeActions.UPDATE_ADMIN_ACCOUNT,input:input,id:id};};export var setSearch=function setSearch(text){return{type:AllTypeActions.GLOBAL_SEARCH,text:text};};export var showMessage=function showMessage(message,severity){return{type:AllTypeActions.SYSTEM_MESSAGE_SHOW,message:message,severity:severity};};export var hideMessage=function hideMessage(){return{type:AllTypeActions.SYSTEM_MESSAGE_HIDE};};
